thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com
thread.title: Gayle

author: Gayle
title: Gayle
text: I got the OneSimCard and purchased the unlimited roaming service so that I could use Google Maps while I was in Paris. I was pleased with the service which also allowed texting. The OneSimCard number was run through another country. This limited the ability of someone I expected to communicate with because their service (with Orange in France) did not permit communication with that country. I was able to send texts to them, they just could not respond.
